summary: WHEN TAKING OFF FROM A STOP AND BEGIN TO ACCELERATES IT LIKE IT GOES TO NEUTRAL THE ENGINE'S BEEN REVS AND THEN SHIFTS BACK INTO GEAR CAN CAUSE A REALLY HARD JARRED IN THE CAR ALL HAPPENS IN ABOUT A SECOND IT HAS DONE IT ROUGHLY 20 OR SO TIMES IN THE 4 MONTHS WE'VE OWNED IT AND THE AND WHEN BREAKING AND ACCELERATING YOU CAN HEAR A CLICKING IN THE FRONT OF DRIVER TIRE AREA AND THE BACK SLIDING DOORS WILL NOT ALWAYS SHUT IT TAKES MULTIPLE ATTEMPTS WHAT THE ELECTRIC MOTORS SOMETIMES YOU HAVE TO MANUALLY SHUT THE DOORS
